allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=root psql -h localhost -U postgres -d grantservice -c "SELECT prompt_template FROM agent_prompts WHERE id = 15;" -t)

Bash(PGPASSWORD=root psql -h localhost -U postgres -d grantservice -c "SELECT id, prompt_key, prompt_description, LEFT(prompt_text, 100) as text_preview, temperature, updated_by FROM ai_agent_prompts WHERE id = 1;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=root psql -h localhost -U postgres -d grantservice -c "SELECT id, agent_name, prompt_key, prompt_description FROM ai_agent_prompts ORDER BY id;")
